articles.title: Apple is adding four new Animoji characters in iOS 11.3
articles.description: Apple is adding four new Animoji to the iPhone X in iOS 11.3 when it comes out this spring: a lion, a dragon, a skull, and a bear

articles.title: The world's first phone with an in-display fingerprint sensor is here
articles.description: The Vivo X20 Plus UD is the world's first phone with an in-display fingerprint scanner, and it's available to order in China today.

articles.author: Sam Rutherford
articles.title: Qualcomm Slapped With $1.2 Billion Fine for Buying Its Way Into iPhones
articles.description: Qualcomm’s legal troubles are only getting worse. Already embroiled in several lawsuits with Apple, Qualcomm was fined $1.2 billion (997 million euros) today by the European Union for violating antitrust regulations. Read more...

articles.author: Tom McKay
articles.title: YouTube Is Asking Promoted Musicians to Sign Non-Disparagement Agreements
articles.description: YouTube is asking musicians who have signed up for a new partnership program in which it provides big-ticket funding for videos and promotional support to sign sweeping non-disparagement agreements, Bloomberg reported on Tuesday. Read more...

articles.title: The #MeToo Movement Hits the Circus: ‘Grandma’ the Clown Resigns
articles.description: Barry Lubin performing as Grandma the clown at the Big Apple Circus in November. Mr. Lubin has resigned and admitted he pressured a teenage girl to pose for pornographic pictures.
